qlabel: 1 PESA_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, did you work in a full service or self serve petrol station?

categories.catLabel: PESA_1A Full service (you fill up the vehicles for the customer)
PESA_1B Self-service (customers fill up their own vehicles)

qlabel: 1 PESA_aVEX_RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you work in an area where there were vehicles driven or had their engines running?
1A1 PESA_aVEX_CHECK_2_1A1 - What types of fuel were used in these vehicles?

categories.catLabel: aVEX_1A1C Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane

qlabel: 1A2 PESA_aVEX_CHECK_2_1A2 - Were these vehicles indoors or outdoors?
1A2A1 PESA_aVEX_CHECK_2_1A2A1 - How was the area ventilated?

categories.catLabel: aVEX_1A2A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point
aVEX_1A2A1B By a general ventilation system
aVEX_1A2A1C By fans in the window or doorway
aVEX_1A2A1D By open doors or windows
aVEX_1A2A1E No ventilation was applied to the area

qlabel: 1A3 PESA_aVEX_RADIO_2_1A3 - How far away did you work from these vehicles?
1A4 PESA_aVEX_RADIO_2_1A4 - In the last working week, did you smell exhaust from the vehicles?
1 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1 - In the last working week, did you degrease items?
1A1 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1 - In the last working week, did you degrease using chemicals other than detergents?
1A1A1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following methods to degrease?

categories.catLabel: aDEG_1A1A1A By hand e.g., with rag, cloth or brush

qlabel: 1A1A1A1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1A1 - What chemicals did you use to clean by hand?
1A1A1B1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1B1 - What chemicals did you use to spray parts?
1A1A1C1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1C1 - What chemicals did you use in the conveyorised degreaser?
1A1A1D1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1D1 - What chemicals did you use in the dip tank?
1A1A1D2 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1A1D2 - Was the dip tank kept covered when not in use?
1A1A1D3 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1A1D3 - Was there a ventilation system on the dip tank?
1A1A1E1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1E1 - What chemicals did you use in the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1E2 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1A1E2 - Was the vapour degreaser covered when not in use?
1A1A1E3 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1A1E3 - Was there a ventilation system on the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1E4 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A1A1E4 - Were there cooling coils around the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1F1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A1A1F1 - What chemicals did you use in the ultrasonic cleaner?
1A2 PESA_aDEG_RADIO_3_1A2 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A2A1 PESA_aDEG_CHECK_3_1A2A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?

categories.catLabel: aDEG_1A2A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge
aDEG_1A2A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus)

qlabel: 1 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A1 PESA_aDVM_CHECK_4_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane

qlabel: 1A2 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?
1A3 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A3 - In the last working week, did you drive or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A3A1 PESA_aDVM_CHECK_4_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry

qlabel: 1A4 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4 - In the last working week, did you perform any maintenance work on vehicles?
1A4A1 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
1A4A1A1 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?
1A4A2 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4A2 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches?
1A4A2A1 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU:  2005]?
1A4A4 PESA_aDVM_RADIO_4_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
1A4A5 PESA_aDVM_CHECK_4_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
1A4A5A1 PESA_aDVM_CHECK_4_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area

qlabel: 1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1 - In the last working week, did you work outside during the day (includes being in a vehicle that is outside)?
1A1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A1 - In the last working week, did you work with or near reflective surfaces, such as sand, glass, roofing iron, water?
1A1A1 PESA_aUVR_CHECK_5_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you work with or near any of the following reflective surfaces?
1A3 PESA_aUVR_CHECK_5_1A3 - When you were working outdoors, were you:

categories.catLabel: aUVR_1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)

qlabel: 1A3A1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3A1 - How many hours per day did you spend working under partial shade?
1A3A2 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3A2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working under partial shade?
1A3A3 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3A3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working under partial shade?
1A3A4 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3A4 - In the last working week did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out under partial shade?
1A3B1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3B1 - In the last working week, how many hours per day did you spend working out in the open?
1A3B2 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3B2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working out in the open?
1A3B3 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3B3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working out in the open?
1A3B4 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3B4 - In the last working week, did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out in the open?
1A3C1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3C1 - In the last working week, did you have your windows open in the vehicle you were working in?
1A3C1A1 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3C1A1 - In the last working week, how many hours per day did you spend working in a vehicle with your windows down?
1A3C1A2 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3C1A2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., long sleeve shirts) when working in the vehicle?
1A3C1A3 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A3C1A3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working in the vehicle?
1A4 PESA_aUVR_RADIO_5_1A4 - In the last working week, did you wear sunglasses when you were working outside?
1 PESA_aCLH_RADIO_6_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
1A1 PESA_aCLH_CHECK_6_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?

categories.catLabel: aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner

qlabel: 1 PESA_aFTC_RADIO_10_1 - In the last working week, did you manually clean inside fuel tanks?
1A1 PESA_aFTC_CHECK_10_1A1 - What type of fuel was in the fuel tank that you cleaned?
1A2 PESA_aFTC_CHECK_10_1A2 - Did you use any of the following products to clean inside the fuel tanks?

categories.catLabel: aFTC_1A2A Solvent-based cleaners (e.g Petroleum distillates/ hydrocarbon cleaners)

qlabel: 1A3 PESA_aFTC_RADIO_10_1A3 - In the last working week, where did you clean fuel tanks?

categories.catLabel: aFTC_1A3B I entered the tank to clean it

qlabel: 1A3A1 PESA_aFTC_CHECK_10_1A3A1 - How was the area ventilated?

categories.catLabel: aFTC_1A3A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point
aFTC_1A3A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face
aFTC_1A3A1C By a general ventilation system
aFTC_1A3A1D By fans in the window or doorway
aFTC_1A3A1E By open doors or windows
aFTC_1A3A1F No ventilation was applied to the area

qlabel: 1A3B1 PESA_aFTC_RADIO_10_1A3B1 - In the last working week, did you use an air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) to enter the tank and clean it?
1A3B2 PESA_aFTC_RADIO_10_1A3B2 - In the last working week, was the tank ventilated before you entered to clean it?
1A4 PESA_aFTC_RADIO_10_1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A4A1 PESA_aFTC_CHECK_10_1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?

categories.catLabel: aFTC_1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge
aFTC_1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus)
aFTC_1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP)
